I consider it more important to move into a posthuman mindset. What I mean by that is not casting away our "humanity," but instead creating a world where some concepts in Buddhism and Shinto become reality. A world full of many different types of intelligent sentient-sapient beings, who all have equal rights as people. And where all of us--including other sentient sapient beings--are immortal and inhabit the rest of the solar system. 

Though I do agree that balance is vital in all things.
